arStrings.szText: With these Runeshards I can enter The Pit of the Artificer. According to Donan's tale, The Pit will hold many rare materials to upgrade weapons and armor.
Travel to Cerrigar and investigate the strange obelisk
I am reminded of a tale Donan used to tell about a young smith. If there is any truth in that tale, I will find it within Nightmare Dungeons.
Donan's tale had more truth to it than not. I will need to find Runeshards from powerful enemies to learn more.
Collect Runeshards from Whisper Bounties, Helltide or Legion Chests, and from Nightmare Dungeons and World Bosses
